programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Maama Machan
programme.desc: ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Kisah dua orang sahabat yang menyara hidup dengan mencuri motosikal secara kecil-kecilan untuk satu sindiket.

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Epok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Epok yang cuba membaiki hubungan tegang antara dia dan bapanya, Pak Din, melalui sukan badminton

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada tahun 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat amaran bencana negara untuk mengelakkan bencana tsunami yang lain. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi melanda lagi.

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Bisu
programme.desc: Nazim menyesal tak sempat berjasa dan menunaikan umrah untuk ibunya. Dia mencari calon ibu yang sesuai untuk disedekahkan pakej umrah. Doanya dimakbul bila terjumpa dengan Mak Nong, peminta sedekah yang bisu.

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada tahun 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat amaran bencana negara untuk mengelakkan bencana tsunami yang lain. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi melanda lagi.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kisah percintaan di timur tengah antara Norlela, dan Putera Amran. Norlela bekerja sebagai penghibur di istana. Raja, telah menitahkan agar Amran dikahwinkan dengan Puteri Faridah, dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Amran tidak bersetuju dan Raja telah murka dengan keputusan Amran.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luqman pernah mengenali seorang gadis bernama Diana ketika Diana melanggar keretanya dahulu. Diana berpenampilan seksi dan mengamalkan cara hidup barat membuatkan Luqman bersangka buruk terhadap Diana. Satu hari, Luqman ke masjid dan terserempak dengan seorang gadis cantik iaitu Adawiyah. Tanpa mengetahui, Adawiyah dan Diana adalah orang yang sama. Diana pernah terlibat dengan kemalangan dan sejak itu hidupnya berubah sepenuhnya.

programme.title: Dilan 1990
programme.desc: Milea bertemu dengan Dilan di sebuah sekolah menengah di Bandung pada tahun 1990. Perkenalan yang luar biasa membuatkan Milea mengenali keunikan Dilan yang bijak, baik dan romantik di matanya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep14
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Motif
programme.desc: Dewi seorang polis penyiasat telah terlibat dalam satu kes penculikan di luar bandar.dalam pada masa yang sama dewi bergelut dengan perasaan sebagai isteri kedua.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Dewi yang dibawa oleh neneknya, Suraya untuk ke Masjid Nabawi, Madinah, Arab Saudi agar Dewi dapat melupakan kekasihnya, Adam.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Feng Shui 2
programme.desc: Lester Menghadapi masalah mencari rezeki untuk menyara keluarganya, dia menerima tawaran daripada seorang wanita Cina misteri untuk memulihkan nasibnya.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Ujian Ramadhan Gadis Penjual Dodol Yang Gemar Bershalawat
programme.desc: Nafisah, seorang gadis cantik, menjual dodol untuk menyara dirinya dan ibunya. Nafisah tidak pernah putus berdoa. Bagaimanapun, hidupnya semakin mencabar kerana ibunya disahkan menghidap kegagalan buah pinggang.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep85
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep5
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep7
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep36
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep86
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Doa Tulus Ibu Angkat Yang Berbuah Hidayah
programme.desc: Midun adalah samseng yang sering mengganggu peniaga di pasar. Namun, segalanya berubah apabila dia bertemu dengan pemilik kedai runcit, Puan Sarah. Dia sanggup menerima Midun dan mengambilnya sebagai anak angkat.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.desc: Danang sentiasa bersemangat menjual tebu untuk memenuhi keperluan hariannya. Danang adalah tulang belakang keluarga, menyara ayah dan ibu saudaranya. Walaupun pendapatan Danang biasa-biasa sahaja, Danang sentiasa berkongsi dengan mereka yang memerlukan.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep12
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep31
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep8
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Josée to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the case, only to uncover a government conspiracy that is bigger than they could have ever imagined.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Confession Of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book "I am the Murderer", claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.desc: In the strict Confucian society of 19th century Korea, a girl takes destiny into her own hands to become Korea’s first female master singer in the traditional art of pansori.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.desc: Ada Choi, Athena Chu, Monica Chan, and Catherine Hung, who are being friends for 30 years, work as partners to operate a restaurant together. programme.title: The Talent Ep5

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10131014
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45834584
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2016
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3579
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2605
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep388
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10151016
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45844585
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2018
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) (Repeat) Ep9
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair…

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao’s home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife’s faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate’s daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman & coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named “The Fastest Sword” but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong’s hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo’s brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu’s house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu’s pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: A former Monkey Kung Fu master crippled by a ruthless villain is convinced by his young disciple to teach him monkey kung fu, so as to avenge his shame.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulio’s fiancée cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiancée taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Wayfarer
programme.desc: Thomas Bareski is a wandering, nature-loving ex-cop who lives out of his van and his life’s mission is to help solve some of France’s 310 unsolved murders. He arrives in Montallier to investigate his first case – the disappearance of a young girl.

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: Saul Indian Horse is an indigenous man who was forcefully removed from his family when he was a young boy. Placed in a strict boarding school, he struggles to find peace with his life. He eventually finds salvation in the unlikeliest of places – hockey.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Burning Birds
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by a local militia, Kusum has to support her eight children and her mother-in-law. With the breadwinner gone, Kusum has to make extreme choices in the face of her desperation.

programme.title: The Traveller: Midnight Mayhem
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in the Arles region, tied up and naked on a pile of wood. Bareski believes this murder is linked to that of two other women killed in 2021 and 2017. He is not alone in the hunt for the killer. An enigmatic woman joins him.

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying father’s watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Murder In Tours
programme.desc: A controversial sculptor is found murdered beside one of his artworks, which has been vandalized with Latin inscriptions. Commander Louise works with her son Sylvain to decode the crime; the clues lead them to disturbing truths about the artist’s works.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys school’s archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: Burning Birds
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by a local militia, Kusum has to support her eight children and her mother-in-law. With the breadwinner gone, Kusum has to make extreme choices in the face of her desperation.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: The Traveller: Midnight Mayhem
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in the Arles region, tied up and naked on a pile of wood. Bareski believes this murder is linked to that of two other women killed in 2021 and 2017. He is not alone in the hunt for the killer. An enigmatic woman joins him.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1
programme.desc: When a bank adviser is found dead, fears of terrorist attacks drives Secret Service Officer Tarkan to ask the police for help. Inspector Mehmet Özakin is sent to work with him to investigate a case laced with corruption, blackmail, and illegal trafficking.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Girl On A Bicycle
programme.desc: Paolo, an Italian in Paris, has just proposed to his German girlfriend when he bumps into a pretty French girl. Smitten, Paolo took some bad advice from a friend and finds his life upside-down with a German fiancée, a French "wife" and two Aussie kids.

programme.title: The Rising Tide
programme.desc: When her father fails to return home, the sound of his boat’s engine is the only thing a daughter has to remember of him. Learning from an elderly mechanic, she wishes to repair her father’s boat in hope of his return.

programme.title: The Traveller: Thief In The Night
programme.desc: Marion was kidnapped on her 8th birthday in Vendee. 29 years later, Judge Elgouarch asked Bareski to resume the investigation because a letter of remorse from the assassin surfaced. Judge Elgouarch’s late father was the investigator of the case then.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream

programme.desc: Sequel to the blockbuster hit, the smart-talking Detroit cop shows the Beverly Hills force how to run business in an attempt to save his friend from an unjust dismissal.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: In this wild action adventure, Axel Foley discovers that mobsters are using a theme park as a front for their money-counterfeiting operation, and defeats the evil scheme while turning the park upside down.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Bad Country concerns a veteran Baton Rouge detective who infiltrates the most powerful criminal enterprise in the South and after taking down its top lieutenant and contract killer, convinces him to turn informant to help bring down the entire organization.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange and subterranean creature with a taste and a talent for speed, Tripp may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: Champion gamer Max Troy discovers events in a video game are being mirrored in the real world. Joining forces with the game's protagonist to unravel the conspiracy before the game's sinister plot overwhelms the city.

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.

programme.title: Right At Your Door
programme.desc: With Los Angeles under sieges by toxic bombs, Brad and Lexi struggle to survive with little supply, limited time and no information.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: Chucky's back! Child's Play 2 continues where the chilling original left off, with Chucky's toy company rebuilding the original doll to prove that there was nothing wrong with it. Mistake.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the legendary swashbuckling hero of England’s Sherwood Forest who defends the poor and battles Alan Rickman’s deliciously evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Socorro - Steve Backshall is in Mexico exploring the Eastern Pacific and the Ravillagigedo Archipelago to find ways to protect the local shark population.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: A look at how grinders in Tim Hortons' mammoth roasting facility tackle thousands of pounds of coffee beans every hour. Also, we look out how empanadas are made on an epic scale, and the history of cocktail sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: This episode looks at factories producing jelly buttons, baby puree, feta cheese and baklava.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Commuters - This episode explores whether the secret to an animal's success in is to keep one foot in the wild and one in the city, becoming a wild commuter. They must overcome the unique challenges the urban world throws at them to benefit from the opportunities on offer.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep8
programme.desc: Hard Lessons, Lasting Impressions - Alaskans break trail and hunt for their survival during the tail end of the brutal winter.

programme.desc: Viewing the manufacturing methods that create wafer-thin peanut brittle, pigs in a blanket, Montreal-style bagels and Indian jalebi.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories including chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream, chocolate mint stick and snowball cookies.

programme.title: Equator From The Air (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: South America - In South America, Gordon flies over the Amazon in search of illegal loggers, and in the Andes he meets conservationists searching for new species before their habitat is destroyed.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Dorset - Starting in Dorset on Stonebarrow Hill, the naturalist walks a 13-mile stretch of the South West Coast Path. Her first stop is at Charmouth, a place well-known for fossil hunting, where local girl Mary Anning found an ichthyosaur in the early 19th century.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Discover how the St Louis Rail Station went from being the biggest in the United States to falling into disrepair.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Robson is on the trail of tuna, machaca and the mighty sail fish off the coast of Costa Rica in Central America.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dilla’s Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire’s fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Great Karoo - In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now it’s a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bears on the Move - Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean’s top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Rescuers - Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Lifesavers - Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The only way is up in this episode as Donal and his trusty sheepdog Max head northbound to county Antrim.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Jacqueline and Jamie - Architects Lizzie Fraher and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a London home. Will the finished build fulfil the dreams of the mother and son who share it?

programme.title: Eat Well For Less (S7) Ep4
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Scotland with a young family relying on takeaways and wasting food. Dad Ajaz wants spicy dishes whereas mum Aliyah prefers milder flavours, but can we get them eating more veg, enjoying the same food and saving money?

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: The Brando, French Polynesia - Giles and Monica fly to the other side of the world to work in one of the world's most luxurious eco resorts on the small island of Tetiaroa in French Polynesia, not too far from Monica's birthplace - Samoa.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Webster-Holmes Family - Danielle wants to cook nutritious meals for her two girls but often resorts to takeaways and frozen food, leading to waste. Will she like Prue and Rupy's meal plan that gets her batch-cooking?

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep1
programme.desc: The first four contenders face their opening Skills Test. Two must get all the details just right as they prepare bangers and mash in only 20 minutes. The others cook monkfish.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep2
programme.desc: Heat one continues as each chef cooks two standout Signature Dishes; a main and a dessert that demonstrate creative flair and individual cooking style.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Jacqueline and Jamie - Architects Lizzie Fraher and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a London home. Will the finished build fulfil the dreams of the mother and son who share it?

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Jamie gets festive with a whole range of delicious no-fuss recipes to help make your Christmas dinner extra-special. From a salmon gravadlax starter to brand new ways to do the turkey, roasties and Brussels & a bonkers new take on the Yorkshire pud.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less (S7) Ep5
programme.desc: In Cardiff, 7-year-old William's food allergies mean the Hulme family are restricted to the products they buy and meals they cook. Gregg and Chris give them new ingredients and veggie packed dishes they can all safely enjoy.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Nadiya returns to Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years, to discover the people preserving old, local traditions and others creating new ones.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Rick Stein arrives in the region of Perigord, famous for black truffles, walnuts and decadent dishes cooked with duck.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep3
programme.desc: In the second heat, the Skills Tests involve scallops and a crème pâtissière swiss roll. Then the chefs try to impress the judges with two Signature Dishes that demonstrate their culinary identities.

programme.desc: Zimbabwean-born Davi and Matt from Australia set out to build a house in the Chess Valley with a radical multicultural design. They decide to manage the venture themselves, and it's not long before the build veers off course.

programme.desc: Stroud and Wootton Bassett - The architect starts out in Stroud, where Phil and Leighla are transforming their ramshackle, listed Georgian farmhouse with an industrial-style extension. George also pays a visit to Wootton Bassett, where he helps a couple flip the layout of their Victorian end-of-terrace home.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Thompson Family - Vikkie and Wayne have a habit of cooking a nightly backup meal for their fussy kids, which has made their shopping bills and food waste skyrocket. Will their kids like what Prue and Rupy have planned?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S12) Ep8
programme.desc: Free-From Week - The remaining bakers explore alternative ingredients as they make a Signature without dairy, a hearty vegan Technical and a towering gluten-free celebration cake for the Showstopper.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep5
programme.desc: Heat three sees four professional chefs challenged to prepare agnolotti with a pea and mint pesto and pan-fried calves liver with walnut beurre noisette.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep6
programme.desc: Heat three continues as the contenders cook their Signature Dishes. The two most impressive chefs will go through to the quarter-final.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Extreme Escapes - In Cambodia we venture to the banks of the Timor Rung River to the Shinta Mani Wild Hotel. A series of 15 tents deep in the wilderness and accessible only after a 3 hour drive from Phnom Penh, access is via a 400 metre zip wire.
